nodes.text: Cyreltov was a Chiss male bounty hunter who operated during the Clone Wars. He worked for the Dark Acolyte Asajj Ventress and the Confederacy of Independent Systems during a battle on the planet Bogoa. Cyreltov wore a suit of armor that vastly increased his strength and a jetpack allowing him to fly.
Since the Chiss were not widely known outside the Unknown Regions at the time of the Clone Wars[source?], it is unclear how Gunner identified Cyreltov's species.
